review: I have had the Fire Stick for a little over a month and am very satisfied.  I debated between this and Apple TV as we use Macs and I-phones, but as Prime users felt the Fire stick was the better choice.  It loaded quickly and set up was straight forward.  As I did not buy it through Amazon due to a Best Buy gift card it was not set up with my account info prior to receiving it.  Signing in to my account information was simple.The search feature without voice is a bit cumbersome, but after a few uses was not a problem.  The remote, though small and simple, is intuitive and works well.  I have downloaded several new apps with no problem.  Amazon material certainly loads much quicker and is front and center in the format, but other items load with little wait time and are easy to see.  I watched "Band of Brothers" and each episode was ready to go when prompted with minimal wait time.I did set up a wireless router extender that is located right near the TV so my signal is very strong.  The primary purpose for this purchase was so we could "cut the cable" (other than internet), and with a new OTA antennae for the TV we are pleased with the set up.I will update this review in a few months if necessary .
